outputting module¶

Author:Dominic Hunt
class outputting.outputting(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: object

An class which manages the outputting to the screen and to files of all data in any form for the simulation

Parameters:

fileName : string

The name and path of the file the figure should be saved to. If ommited the file will be saved to a default name.

saveFig : bool

If true the figure will be saved.

silent : bool

If false the figure will be plotted to the screen. If true the figure will be closed

label : string

The label for the simulation
end()[source]¶
